Ways to expose your app in Kubernetes

what is Docker?

Docker is a technology that allows you to incorporate and store your code and its dependencies into a neat little package - an image

Docker is a tool designed to make it easier to create, deploy, and run applications by using containers.

Containers:

Containers are encapsulated environments in which applications are run. A container is defined by the image and configuration options.

Containers allow a developer to package up an application with all of the parts it needs, such as libraries and other dependencies, and ship it all out as one package.

main Concepts to learn about Docker.

Docker Images

Docker Images contain our application code + everything the app needs to run. e.g all the modules etc are inside the the image. (just remembering this line is all docker)

Docker Containers.

Containers basically run Images inside them.
